zh_def: 认为物质是世界的本原
en_def: View that matter is the fundamental substance of reality
example: 马克思的历史唯物主义

zh_def: 认为意识或精神是世界的根本
en_def: Doctrine that reality is fundamentally mental or spiritual

zh_def: 强调个人自由、选择与存在意义
en_def: Philosophy emphasizing individual freedom and meaning

zh_def: 认为知识源自经验与感官观察
en_def: View that knowledge derives from experience

zh_def: 认为理性是知识的主要来源
en_def: View that reason is the chief source of knowledge

zh_def: 认为真理取决于实践效果
en_def: Philosophy that truth is what works in practice
Study of structures of consciousness from first-person view

zh_def: 认为结构决定意义与行为
en_def: View that meaning arises from underlying structures

zh_def: 批判结构主义的稳定意义观
en_def: Critique of stable meaning in structuralism

zh_def: 重视语言分析与逻辑清晰性
en_def: Philosophy focusing on logical analysis of language

zh_def: 否认客观价值或意义的存在
en_def: Denial of objective meaning or value
details: 可导致积极的自我创造

zh_def: 认为人类追求意义与世界无意义的矛盾
en_def: View that human search for meaning meets a meaningless world
details: 主张在荒诞中肯定生活

zh_def: 以人为中心，强调人的尊严与理性
en_def: Philosophy emphasizing human value and reason

zh_def: 主张顺应自然、无为而治
en_def: Chinese philosophy advocating harmony with nature

zh_def: 强调仁义礼智信与社会和谐
en_def: Philosophy emphasizing moral virtue and social order

zh_def: 主张以法治国、以刑止乱
en_def: Philosophy advocating rule by law and strict governance
Philosophy based on impermanence, causation, and emptiness

zh_def: 强调理性控制情感、顺应命运
en_def: Philosophy of self-control and acceptance of fate
example: 爱比克泰德、马可·奥勒留
